messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2175
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/26/02 6:12:34 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... is this special?? I thought the ones that twisted their arms were the weird ones in
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/26/02 6:12:34 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> I put mascara on the right eye with the right hand and the left eye with the
>
> left hand. It used to get a laugh in college. My friends would turn their
> right arms kind of upside down and backwards to get the left eyes

is this special?? I thought the ones that twisted their arms were the weird
ones in college??????? it seems like it doesnt require so much dexterity to
put mascara on......i dont do anything else w/ my left hand....Denise


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
